title: Bug 3666 - Code Completion Hungry code assist
OB:
The code is changed to:

baz(x.foo().foo())
EB:
Expected Behavior:

I would rather it gave me:

baz(x.foo(), x.foo())
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the enclosed class.
2. Go to the bar method.
3. Add a parameter to the baz call to make the program correct.
